note:
he/him/his

ml sys eng into left politics, history, genre fiction, cooking, etc.

in a previous life i did mac and ios dev. once upon a time i contributed to HandBrake. long before that i was an op on UnderMac under the handle korendil. now i'm at ThreatWarrior.

i used to post on the herald.co.uk mailing list for Mercedes Lackey and lurk on the rec.arts.sf.written.robert-jordan newsgroup. i was on MetaFilter back in the day. reddit and twitter refugee.

fnord.

fields.name: So. Florida…?
fields.value: i’m from here, and while my mom is around i don’t want to be too far away in case of emergencies. i’m not here for the culture.

fields.name: Why jbr*jake* if your name is Jon?
fields.value: my initials + my nickname from a poli sci class a long time ago, referencing Joliet Jake of the Blues Brothers

fields.name: Your account seems kind of dead
fields.value: for complicated reasons, i am not not posting to social media right now. i read my feed all the time.
